text: James Drewry Stewart (March 29, 1941December 3, 2014) was a Canadian mathematician, violinist, and the professor emeritus of mathematics at McMaster University. Stewart died in Toronto, Canada from multiple myeloma, aged 73.Press Release Fields Institute 2014-12-04. ==References== ==Other websites== *Stewart Calculus Official Biography *The house that math built by Katie Daubs at the Toronto Star Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Canadian academics Category:McMaster University Category:Canadian violinists Category:Canadian mathematicians Category:University of Toronto alumni
title: James Stewart (mathematician)
